title: Titanic (Captioned)
creator_credit: Lightstorm Entertainment, James Cameron and Jon Landau
brief_description: This sweeping love story sailed into the hearts of moviegoers around the globe, ultimately emerging as the most popular motion picture of all time. Starring Leonardo Di Caprio and Kate Winslet as star-crossed lovers who find themselves on the maiden voyage of the “unsinkable” R.M.S. Titanic. When the doomed luxury liner strikes an iceberg in the frigid North Atlantic, their passionate love affair becomes a thrilling race for survival. Winner of eleven Academy Awards including Best Picture, this tale of forbidden love and courage in the face of disaster triumphs as a true cinematic masterpiece.
